item.title: Me being sexy
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

I kind of feel like writing a long, drawn out flame towards the faggot trying to deal out the ‘verbal beat down’ (G_stringer).

Little kids like you trying to preach a message of anti-anti-Semitism are utterly retarded. Almost everyone here is joking around about Hitler being so great, but you honestly need to learn how to take a joke. Fighting everything to make yourself seem intelligent eventually makes you look like a fucking idiot. Instead of going with the flow and taking the joke, you decide to be a stuck up grammar policeman and rage on everyone. Regardless of how sad your life is or how many of your family members died in the Holocaust or some other genocide, it doesn’t give you permission to spoil the lulz with incorrect information.

Moving towards your comment about racism and religion being connected in any way - you’re retarded. The word you’re looking for, when talking about discrimination or prejudice against Jews, is anti-Semitism. Even though you haven’t learned it in your third grade class yet, it’s still the right word. Racism’s definition is as follows: “Racism, by its simplest definition, is the belief that race is the primary determinant of human traits and capacities and that racial differences produce an inherent superiority of a particular race. People with racist beliefs might hate certain groups of people according to their racial groups. …” I don’t remember if you quoted that same definition or not, but I’ll break it down for your small brain anyways.

Let’s start easy!

the belief that race is the primary determinant of human traits and capacities and that racial differences produce an inherent superiority of a particular race.

This sentence, in short, means that racism is the belief that one race is higher up than another race, for any idiotic reason (traits mentioned in the above quote.)

Next one, getting a little more difficult!

People with racist beliefs might hate certain groups of people according to their racial groups. ...

This sentences means that people who are racist (prejudice) possible hate members of other races depending on what race they are.

I ask you, did this mention religion at all? I could write a book telling you why you’re such a retard, but I’m sure you know that already. If you haven’t tl;dr’d already, go ahead and look for an article (NOT ON FUCKING WIKIPEDIA) about religious discrimination vs. racial discrimination.

Religious groups != race.

Stop ruining the lulz, learn to take a joke.

That all being said…

Read full topic
